context: Hi. I want to veg out this weekend. Know anything that's not too heavy?
How about Chappie (2015) or I, Robot (2004)
Never heard of Chappie. I Robot is a little to technical for me I could watch Footloose (1984) every time it comes on TV though
rec: War for the Planet of the Apes (2017)
resp: How about War for the Planet of the Apes (2017) that was fun
